reviewText: My kids love this workout! Great way to keep them active in the colder weather.

This is a great kid friendly workout DVD! Jalen (the host) made a live appearance at our local gym and did the workout DVD with the kids. I'll tell you what... The kids had a blast!!!  Easy and definitely doable workout that got all the kids heart rates pumping.  If you care about fitness and want to instill these good habits in your kids pick up this DVD. Can't beat the price!  http://buff.ly/1LOlaLA

This is the one and only exercise program that my autistic grandson loves and will do. It is easy to follow and the kids just look friendly and happy. I like how much exercise is packed into each session and that it can be used in short segments, or for a longer period of exercise.
My grandson likes the "water breaks", too.
My students  beg me daily to  do these  with them.  Great Brain breaks.
Granddaughter really wasn't that enthused with the fitness for kids prefer doing the grown up because it was more energized she said and that's coming from a four year old

Excellent, safe and kid friendly!!! Fitness 4 Kids is fun way to keep the kids active and entertained. My girls 6 and 8 yrs old just have a blast and the video teaches in a safe and memorable way. Host Jalen Jones does an excellent job keeping the audience attention.
 I highly recommend you get this video for your children
Kids aren't very interested in it. Seems older
It was just okay. Jalen Jones was boring and monotone. The workout intensity was average. My 12 yr old daughter said it was just okay and she would rather look for a different workout video.
Kids kinda like this but I think this kid is boring, he  needs more personality to motivate for repeated sessions.
